title: Canada alleges much wider campaign by Modi government against Sikhs
content: Canada on Monday ordered six Indian diplomats to leave the country, including India’s top diplomat in Ottawa, Sanjay Kumar Verma, officials said.
summary: Canada on Monday ordered six Indian diplomats to leave the country, including India’s top diplomat in Ottawa, Sanjay Kumar Verma, officials said.

title: Live updates: Israel strikes Gaza’s al-Aqsa Hospital grounds, 200 targets in southern Lebanon
content: Israel’s military struck what it said was a Hamas command center embedded inside a hospital compound in Deir al-Balah in central Gaza early on Monday.

title: What is UNIFIL, the U.N. peacekeeping force in Lebanon?
content: The U.N. Interim Force in Lebanon has been patrolling the Israel-Lebanon border for more than 45 years.

title: Pakistan’s internet slows to a crawl as suspicion falls on government

title: Ukraine boosting its defense industries, with a little help from friends

title: Deadly strikes in northern Gaza; Biden concerned after Israeli forces hit peacekeepers

title: Captured documents reveal Hamas’s broader ambition to wreak havoc on Israel
